name: Astron (NeatGames)
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After taking a break from GameDev (I was super busy with IRL work + a side job)

I am back to learn and make games!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Astron Goal: Find 2 crystals in the level and move on :D

This is not a real game, just a practice and learning experience.  I'm going to make a few small games like this until I decide what I want to work on for a few months.

What do you thing about it's simple design and effects?  Any ideas to make it better?  Let me know in the YouTube video comments! (More likely to see those as I'm not here much hehe)

Happy game-making everyone :D

^^
